did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Topical files, research notes, office files, correspondence, speeches, drafts of articles and other writings, and economic reports.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers include Golay's topical files concerning chiefly international economic development and relations, and Philippine development, history, and economics. Also, research notes, office files, correspondence, speeches, drafts of articles and other writings, and economic reports.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers include Golay's topical files concerning chiefly international economic development and relations, and Philippine development, history, and economics. Also, research notes, office files, correspondence, speeches, drafts of articles and other writings, and economic reports.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Frank H. Golay papers, #14-10-2760. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
